title: Perturbation theory for the parabolic regularity problem
abstract:
We show small and large Carleson perturbation results for the parabolic
regularity boundary value problem with boundary data in $\dot{L}_{1,1/2}^p$.
The operator we consider is $L:=\partial_t -\mathrm{div}(A\nabla\cdot)$ and the
domains are parabolic cylinders $\Omega=\mathcal{O}\times\mathbb{R}$, where
$\mathcal{O}$ is a chord arc domain or Lipschitz domain.
